overview: Ms. Greer, has over two decades of experience in operations, administration, legal services, investor relations and broker-dealer relations, and commercial banking. Prior to co-founding Waveland, Ms. Greer co-founded and served as a Partner for Taurus Capital Group, LLC. During her tenure at Taurus, she established a comprehensive platform to process investments, facilitate broker and investor relations and, in coordination with legal counsel, comply with corporate and securities law. Prior to her involvement in the financial industry, Ms. Greer spent many years as a paralegal with law firms in both Irvine, California and El Paso, Texas.
